attributes.action: Divest the Secretary of State for Defence of the portfolio for Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown has added the portfolio of Secretary of State for Scotland to the brief of the Secretary of State for Defence.

With our armed forces in action in two main theatres and concern about over-stretch, defence is no backwater or part-time job.  The Secretary of State for Defence should concentrate 100% on armed forces matters - and not on Scotland or anything else (except his constituency).  The portfolio for Scotland should be handed to another minister.
